text: Va [ʙa jod ovared] hangome ki az Bani Isroil pajmon giriftem, ki: "Cuz Allohi jagonaro parastis nakuned va ʙa padaru modaru nazdikonu jatimon va ʙenavojon neki kuned va ʙa mardum [suxani] nek ʙiguedu namoz ʙarpo dored va zakot ʙipardozed", vale hamai sumo, cuz iddai kame pust gardonided va rujgardon suded
